title: Toothbreaker
description: A man who betrayed his people. A woman who once loved him. An Eritam that hunts them both.Sage has lost everything: Tamar, the Eritam woman he once loved… Fang, the wolf he considered his friend… his status as a Toothbreaker. Even his old friend Vartok tries to hunt him down! Sage knows he must make a choice. Will he continue to serve Malstorm, or surrender to Melchizedek? The wrong choice could cost his life.
author: M.H. Elrich
